Reviews.Title: The Perfect Phone For T-mobile 3G+ Awsome , Beautiful , Simple , and High Tech
Reviews.Author: Ricanguy007 "Ricanguy007"
Reviews.Content: Bought this Phone for my wife and if you want a well built advanced, and most of all it is so easy to use and understand, you don't even need a book, just pop in your T- Mobile chip, transfer your contacts and off you go, no contract or overpricing, cheaper than t-Mobile itself , I have been with T- mobile since they started as Aerial then Voice Stream, The main thing is not GSM its that the network is 1700 this way you get 3 0r 4G immediately , Ive used most different cell phone with different Operating Systems Sybian for Nokia, Android on my new Sony, I phone uses its own , Blackberry uses its own. But in reality the market is saturated with more Android as anything cause there are more apps, but  that doesn't make none better, they all have the equivalent in its own operating system. But one difference this HTC HD7 being a Window based operating system is the one of the Best, for ease of operation, if you have a computer you know windows, it is very attractive,very responsive, the screen is large 4.3, icons also,all the main features are right in front 1 click away do anything , easy to understand for everyone including senior citizens and young kids and people who don't like read books and weeks of learning and some get so complicated we send the phone back. Yes I highly recommend this phone, to any one, who wants to be ahead in technology with a great smart phone, as great but much more simple and so easy to operate than many new smart phones.
